price: 63 Ils dirent : « Nous sommes seulement venus infliger à ton peuple le châtiment dont il n’a cessé de douter.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qālū bal ji'nāka bimā kānū fīhi yamtarūna
